BugHuntr.io Devdocs

Introduction

This documentation is intended for creators wanting to publish scenarios on bughuntr.io. It will guide you though creating a scenario, configuring metadata and publishing the scenario bughuntr.io.

  • Metadata
    • Executors
    • Commands
    • Expose services
    • Flags
    • Display
  • Images
  • Networking
  • Testing
  • State
  • External assets
  • Rules and requirements
  • Tips
  • FAQ

Contact

If you have any suggestions or questions which are not answered by this guide, you can contact us:

  • GitHub for suggestions, technical issues or bugs
  • support@bughuntr.io for any other reason
